name: Enkai Buchou
summary:
I will improve the skills of 4 banquet arts that are indispensable for banquets, such as "drinking master" and "catch dance", and aim to be the manager of tomorrow's banquet.

If you clear the beginner mode, you can play the professional mode. Earn bingo tickets according to the score in each game. Items collected by bingo can be collected in the waiting room.

Drinking Master:
I will pour beer well into the flowing empty mug. Don't forget to replenish the pitcher's beer!

Catch Dance:
Catch the flying fruit with a sword and compete for the score. Let's exchange the full sword in a timely manner.

Champagne Tower:
We will pile up champagne glasses aiming for the stars in the night sky. Beware of disturbing slippers!!

Duet Star:
The sense of rhythm is life in songs! Press the button at the right time according to the notes and aim for a high score!

Bingo the Great:
I got a bingo ticket based on the result of the mini-game. With the collected tickets, you can challenge the bingo game.

You can get the number of bingo items you won. Your title will be determined by the number of prizes!
